songs.title: Mowgli’s Road
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Cuckoo! (Cuckoo! Cuckoo!)
Cuckoo! (Cuckoo! Cuckoo!)
Cuckoo! (Cuckoo! Cuckoo!)
Cuckoo! (Cuckoo! Cuckoo!)

[Verse 1]
Ten silver spoons coming after me
One life with one dream on repeat
I'll escape if I try hard enough
Till King of the Jungle calls my bluff

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, Lord (Oh, Lord)
I have been told (I have been told)
That I must take the unforsaken road
Forsaken road

[Chorus]
There's a fork in the road
I'll do as I am told
And I don't know, don't know, don't know, don't know
Who I wanna be

[Refrain]
Cuckoo! (Cuckoo! Cuckoo!)
Cuckoo! (Cuckoo! Cuckoo!)
Cuckoo! (Cuckoo! Cuckoo!)
Cuckoo! (Cuckoo! Cuckoo!)

[Verse 2]
You say Y-E-S to everything
Will that guarantee you a win?
Do you think you will be good enough
To love others and to be loved?

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, Lord (Oh, Lord)
Now I can see (Now I can see)
The cutlery will keep on chasing me
Forsaken road

[Chorus]
There's a fork in the road
I'll do as I am told
And I don't know, don't know, don't know, don't know
Who I wanna be

[Bridge]
We are the spoons, metal-ly mean
We scooped our way into your dreams
To knock the knives out bloody cold
And lead you down the unforsaken road
Forsaken road

[Chorus]
There's a fork in the road
I'll do as I am told
And I don't know, don't know, don't know, don't know
Who I wanna be
Cuckoo!
